Description: When you activate this move, you bounce high into the air, disappearing into the Ethereal plane. You may not be targeted by attacks in the Ethereal plane. On your next turn, as an action, you reappear and attempt to slam down on top of a creature. Make a melee attack roll on a creature in range, with advantage, doing flying damage on a hit. On a natural attack roll of 15 or more, the target is paralyzed.
